title: Add enums and Resource base class
description: Phase 1.1: Add ResourceKind, DocumentKind, CatalogEntryRelationKind, BookmarkRelationKind enums. Add Resource base class with joined-table inheritance (resources table). Fields: id, kind (discriminator), uri, title, description, created_at, updated_at. Add documents relationship with cascade='all, delete-orphan' via Document.parent_id. All in src/catalog/catalog/store/models.py.
close_reason: All model classes, enums, and exports implemented in models.py and store/__init__.py

title: Add tests for new Resource subclass models
description: Phase 2.2: Add tests for new models. Test Resource base: create, unique URI constraint, repr. Test Catalog + CatalogEntry: create, relationship, cascade delete entries. Test Collection + CollectionMember: create, membership, cascade deletes members but not resources. Test Bookmark + BookmarkLink: create, link to resource, cascade deletes links. Test Repository + RepositoryLink: create, link to resource, cascade deletes links. Test polymorphic querying: session.query(Resource) returns mixed types.
close_reason: All model tests updated and passing (38 tests)

title: Update DatasetRepository for Resource hierarchy
description: Phase 3.1: Update DatasetRepository. create() now needs uri parameter (or generates it). All PK-based lookups unchanged (still int). get_by_uri() moves to a base ResourceRepository or stays. File: src/catalog/catalog/store/repositories.py.
close_reason: Repositories updated: DatasetRepository, DocumentRepository refactored (parent_id, uri), new CatalogRepository, CollectionRepository, BookmarkRepository, RepoRepository added

title: Update DocumentRepository for Resource hierarchy
description: Phase 3.2: Update DocumentRepository. create(): dataset_id -> parent_id, add uri and doc_type params. get_by_path(): dataset_id -> parent_id. list_by_dataset() -> list_by_parent() (or keep name for convenience). All path-based queries: dataset_id -> parent_id. File: src/catalog/catalog/store/repositories.py.
close_reason: Implemented DocumentMeta dataclass, VaultSchema Pydantic base, FrontmatterTransform, and wired into pipeline. 45 new tests all passing.

title: Add repositories for new Resource types
description: Phase 3.3: Add CatalogRepository (CRUD for Catalog, manage entries), CollectionRepository (CRUD for Collection, manage members), BookmarkRepository (CRUD for Bookmark, manage links), RepoRepository (CRUD for Repository, manage links). Consider a base ResourceRepository with shared logic. Parallel with 3.1 and 3.2. File: src/catalog/catalog/store/repositories.py.
close_reason: Repositories updated: DatasetRepository, DocumentRepository refactored (parent_id, uri), new CatalogRepository, CollectionRepository, BookmarkRepository, RepoRepository added

title: Update Pydantic schemas for Resource hierarchy
description: Phase 4.1: Update DatasetCreate: add optional title, description; URI generation stays in service. Update DocumentCreate: dataset_id -> parent_id, add optional doc_type. Update DatasetInfo / DocumentInfo: reflect new field names. Add schemas for Catalog, Collection, Bookmark, Repository. File: src/catalog/catalog/store/schemas.py.

title: Update DatasetService for Resource hierarchy
description: Phase 4.2: URI generation unchanged (already generates from name). Document creation passes parent_id instead of dataset_id. File: src/catalog/catalog/store/dataset.py.

title: Add services for new Resource types
description: Phase 4.3: Add service classes for Catalog, Collection, Bookmark, Repository. Each service wraps its corresponding repository with business logic (URI generation, validation). Parallel with 4.2.

title: Update FTS managers for parent_id
description: Phase 5.1: Update store/fts.py and store/fts_chunk.py: dataset_id -> parent_id in all queries. Files: src/catalog/catalog/store/fts.py, src/catalog/catalog/store/fts_chunk.py.

title: Update docstore and transform for parent_id
description: Phase 5.2: Update store/docstore.py: Document construction uses parent_id. Update transform/llama.py: PersistenceTransform / ChunkPersistenceTransform use parent_id. Files: src/catalog/catalog/store/docstore.py, src/catalog/catalog/transform/llama.py.

title: Delete IngestPipeline, implement DirectorySource, wire docstore caching
Refactor Dataset to extend Resource
description: Phase 1.2: Change Dataset(Base) to Dataset(Resource). Add id FK to resources.id as PK. Keep name, source_type, source_path on datasets table. Remove uri, created_at, updated_at (now on resources). Add polymorphic_identity = ResourceKind.DATASET. Remove old documents relationship (now inherited from Resource). File: src/catalog/catalog/store/models.py.
close_reason: All model classes, enums, and exports implemented in models.py and store/__init__.py

title: Update settings.py with DatabasesSettings

description: Move existing models from models.py to catalog.py with CatalogBase

title: Create catalog/store/models/content.py

description: Re-export CatalogBase as Base for backward compat, export ContentBase

title: Implement DatabaseRegistry in database.py

title: Update ADR-0002 with WAL atomicity caveat
description: Document that WAL mode limits cross-database transaction atomicity

title: Add Qdrant dependencies to catalog
description: Add llama-index-vector-stores-qdrant and qdrant-client to pyproject.toml

title: Add QdrantSettings and embedding_dim to settings

title: Rewrite VectorStoreManager for Qdrant
description: Replace SimpleVectorStore with QdrantVectorStore in catalog/store/vector.py. Add _get_client(), _ensure_collection() methods. Update delete_by_dataset to use Qdrant filter API.

title: Add dataset_name metadata to transforms
description: In ChunkPersistenceTransform, add dataset_name as separate metadata field for efficient Qdrant filtering

title: Refactor Document to extend Resource
description: Phase 1.3: Change Document(Base) to Document(Resource). Add id FK to resources.id as PK. Rename dataset_id to parent_id (FK to resources.id, ondelete=CASCADE). Rename kind to doc_type (DocumentKind enum). Remove created_at, updated_at (now on resources). Add parent_resource relationship back to Resource. Add inherit_condition = id == Resource.id. Update indexes: ix_documents_dataset_path -> ix_documents_parent_path, etc. Keep get_metadata() / set_metadata() helpers. File: src/catalog/catalog/store/models.py.
close_reason: All model classes, enums, and exports implemented in models.py and store/__init__.py

title: Update test fixtures for Qdrant
description: Update mock_vector_store fixture in conftest.py to mock QdrantVectorStore. Use in-memory Qdrant for integration tests.

title: Add if_modified_since filtering to sources and job
description: Add if_modified_since: datetime | None param to ObsidianVaultSource, HeptabaseVaultSource, their configs, SourceConfig, DatasetSourceConfig, and the factory/dispatch wiring.

title: Add Catalog + CatalogEntry models
description: Phase 1.4: Catalog(Resource) on catalogs table: id, homepage. CatalogEntry(Base) on catalog_entries table: id, catalog_id, resource_id, relation (CatalogEntryRelationKind), created_at, created_by. Cascade: deleting Catalog deletes entries; ondelete=CASCADE on both FKs. Unique index on (catalog_id, resource_id). Parallel with 1.5-1.7. File: src/catalog/catalog/store/models.py.
close_reason: All model classes, enums, and exports implemented in models.py and store/__init__.py

title: Add Collection + CollectionMember models
description: Phase 1.5: Collection(Resource) on collections table: id only. CollectionMember(Base) on collection_members table: id, collection_id, resource_id, created_at. Cascade: deleting Collection deletes member rows only; ondelete=CASCADE on both FKs. Unique index on (collection_id, resource_id). Parallel with 1.4, 1.6, 1.7. File: src/catalog/catalog/store/models.py.
